website_summaries.verdict: An ultra thin tempered glass screen protector that offers all the protection of thicker varieties. Ideal if you're looking for a slim option that doesn't compromise on quality.
pros: Thinner than most for superior responsiveness and transparency
Reduced bulk offers a better fit for home console slots
Tempered glass is shatter and scratch resistant
Features rounded edges for a safer grip
Oil-resistant coating makes it easy to wipe away smudges and fingerprints
Comes with two Nintendo Switch screen protectors, an alcohol swab, and dust wipe
cons: A little extra care is needed during application to prevent bubbles or trapped dust

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove
customer_reviews.text: After breaking the screen protector that came with the case we got for our Nintendo Switch, I had to order these. This time, I followed the instructions on the video on the Amazon page for these screen protectors. It worked like a charm. The screen protector fits perfectly, gives complete screen coverage and protection, allows good touch screen abilities, video is crystal clear, fits in the dock perfectly with the protective case installed and has a second screen protector included just in case anything happens to the first one. Very good value for the money. It fits like a glove. Definitely a recommend from me.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Roth

customer_reviews.title: Good Thing 2x Were Included
customer_reviews.text: Once installed these screen protectors are quite nice. The process to install them was a bit annoying in my experience. First, I would suggest not using the included alcohol wipes, they are so over saturated they end up leaving more residue on the screen than they remove; I would suggest using a camera lens wipe. Second, it's good the kit includes 2x screen protectors because one of mine came pre-scratched; there's a good 2-2.5 inch scrape on the bottom edge of one of the protectors. Overall I would say it's worth the money as it will protect the switch's plastic display, but I would be careful with the install and avoid the terrible alcohol wipes.
customer_reviews.author: CarbonVirus

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this one for your Switch! Dust stickers get stuck to screen, it's hard to take off, and leaves residue!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought the amFilm screen protector. Only because I wanted to save a little money. I couldn't even apply it properly because the dust remover stickers kept getting stuck to the screen and left its own marks with them. Cleaning that residue with the included alcohol cleaning wipe took some time too. Afterwards, I had dust flying because I had to apply pressure with the microfiber cloth to get it completely off. By the end of it, I had dust inside the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Red Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protection
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this screen protector to protect the Switch's screen from scratching when I remove it from the dock. The screen protector was simple to install. I also installed a case (Mumba Dockable Case for Nintendo Switch, [Blade Series] TPU Grip Protective Cover Case) and it works perfectly as it did not interfere with the screen protector. So far, close to two months, and there are no scratches on the screen protector yet from un-docking the switch. I feel that this will hold and work for it's intended purpose without any issues. I definitely feel secure that this screen protector will fully protect my Switch's screen. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gio

customer_reviews.title: Think about a different brand before buying.
customer_reviews.text: So first of all the wipes they give you end up leaving a lot of fibers behind. Also, the stickers provided left sticky hard to get off residue on my screen. Also, the card they provide is super tiny. I am using the card to get out the air bubbles and the screen proctor completely cracked so I am questioning the durability of the protector and I will look at getting something else in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: KP2000

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: Like most screen protectors, these ship with a clear protected side, and a sticky side. Upon removing the clear protector on both of the screens, packaging lint either was present ON the screen under the protector, or transfered off the shipping materials as I attempted to remove the cover. I carefully cleaned the area, attempted to complete the second one, and after removing the protector again dust was present under the protector. Threw both away -- complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brink

customer_reviews.title: Skip the Sticker Step
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect. Everything went well when applying the screen protector except the step where it says to use the sticker to pick up the dust. Don't use the sticker, just clean the screen the best you can with the cloth provided. I attempted to dab up the dust with the sticker and the sticker was coming apart and got stuck to the screen. It was difficult to remove the sticker residue after that had happened. Recommend to skip that step and just clear the screen of dust the best you can with the cloth provided. Other than that it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: brenden

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this a little over a month ago, and it is working well. Touch screen is still responsive, and there are absolutely no issues with docking the Switch. The installation instructions could be changed to make it easier; I’ve installed a lot of phone screen protectors and the instructions for THIS one for the Switch are a little wonky. But if you know what you’re doing, it is easy. The screen is bubble-free and debris-free. I am VERY happy with this screen protector! And if I ever need another one, I will definitely reorder this!
customer_reviews.author: K. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Good price/value
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Fits current Nintendo Switch perfectly. Like any protective screen it is not totally resistant to fingerprint smears but does a pretty good job, and provides solid protection. When applying the glass I found it easiest to remove the film then carefully find the top left corner lip. Seat the protective screen corner in top left as snugly as possible. Seat the lower left corner against the lip of the switch and apply slowly from left to right working out bubbles as you go.
customer_reviews.author: AEV2

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: First of all you only get 2 in the pack, for the price I can’t say it’s worth it. Second they skimp on the included installation tools, you only get 2 tapes, a very small microfiber cloth and a very very small applicator card, there is no installation guide frame or even small wing tabs like you see in other products to aid the installation. I got out some painters tape and did the hinge method installation and boy did things not go well, both started almost immediately to lift from the corner and edges. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of two were okay
customer_reviews.text: one had a jagged chipped edge and the other was perfect went on flawlessly told seller about the one and they said i would have to remove the other one and send both back for them to replace the bad one. doesnt really work when you bought them for and put one on your kids switch and then you have to tell them you have to remove it and oh sorry cant use the switch till we get new ones. will look elsewhere due to cust support. the one that was fine did fit well and went on perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mastershake

customer_reviews.title: Missing a star for lack of materials
customer_reviews.text: Great quality screen protectors, the only problem with this kit is it only comes with enough alcohol wipes and dust stickers for the application of a single screen protector. If you ever need to use the second one you're simply out of luck. If it had enough materials for both screen protectors this'd be a 5 star product. For now I can only recommend the amFilm screen protectors as they were more thoughtful with their kit,
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Looks perfect and can be done super fast!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product! I was being really picky about what screen protector to get for my new Nintendo Switch and decided with this one. This has definitely been the easiest one to put on hands down. I always dread putting these on because I end up with bubbles and I'm just no good at putting these on. But once I set it where I wanted it to be, little by little I eased it on my screen and it only took me a couple minutes! I am amazed, it looks great, NO BUBBLES! If you're looking for a screen protector for your Switch, this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: This company, even in the hardest times PROVIDES a great product & customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: Man was I surprised when I got my package just the other day from Orzly, having the pleasant surprise of opening my box to see this! What a great company and excellent product I might add as well! My brand new switch has never felt safer and that’s important in light of these recent manufacturing shortages due to COVID-19! Speaking of, thank you for the wonderful letter wishing me and mine safe as well as the great goodies thrown in as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Generally, the screen is fit perfect and doing its job as protector
customer_reviews.text: As headline stated, it is fit and doing the job but I give 3 instead of 5 star rating because I am bit of trouble applying the protector. This trouble might be just me, but not others. First, I prefer the protector should have two dog/rabbit ear-small tabs on both sides as the guide for easier installation when applying on the Switch's screen. Second, the including piece of protector air bubble squeezer is kinda soft to do the job. I have about half-inch air bubble, I have to use the squeezer but it is so soft to press to take air bubble out of the protector. Finally I have to use my credit card to finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Huy Tra

customer_reviews.title: Scratch Free Switch
customer_reviews.text: I heard the stories, so I was used the plastic bag the switch came in to prevent scratches from the docker to the screen while I waited for this to arrive. The moment I placed the protector on the screen, it was a little entertaining watching the screen meld with the switch. Fair warning: the screen adheared probably a little too quickly causing large bubbles. With a little patience and needing, I was able to clear all bubbles for a seemless overlay. Now I can rest at ease not worrying about plastic scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Walker

customer_reviews.title: I was afraid to buy cheap screen protectors
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully, these are quality. I would’ve gladly paid $8.99 for just one screen protector, but including two is much better because I know people with their first time putting a screen protector on would make a mistake. So it’s great that it comes with two and clear instructions on how to apply. NOTE: I highly suggest using a credit card to push out air bubbles, the included thing is small and doesn’t really get the job done. But apart from that, I give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: iAmStevin

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these the same day I bought my switch and they arrived several days earlier than expected so I didn't have to play on my switch without screen protection for too long. Pros: Price, you get two which is great because I ended up getting a large piece of dirt under my first Easy to remove in case you need to replace it or move it Comes with stickers to remove dust before placing it down and a dust rag too
customer_reviews.author: Nightfall

customer_reviews.title: Better than the AmFilm protectors!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Orzly screen protectors after installing 4 (2 of the 2-packs) of the AmFilm protectors. They weren’t bad, but each installation had very minor flaws. I found that if I tried to lift a corner to correct the flaw, the corner would get an air bubble that would not go away. When installing this Orzly protector, a single air bubble formed. I was able to lift the corner to get the bubble out and the corner went back down flawlessly. Very happy with these protectors.
customer_reviews.author: jonlong

customer_reviews.title: A necessity
customer_reviews.text: Prouduct is exactly as described. Packaging is very vibrant and eye-catching. Instructions and application tools came with product that make putting this on your switch super easy. My advice: GO SLOWLY! I was in a little bit of a hurry when I put my screen protector on and it went down a little crooked. Had to peel it off and straighten it, but now the corner where I started prying it up won't adhere again (it does come with two so if you have extreme OCD you can try again). Now I don't worry about scratching it when I slide it into the dock!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Slightly too big
customer_reviews.text: I've worked in mobile and installed hundreds of screen protectors. I'm very disappointed that these screen protectors are ever so slightly too big. Because of the size and the raised edge on the Switch, it won't lie completely flat and there's air pockets in two of the corners. I even tried both thinking it was maybe just a one-off. Unfortunately, neither worked well. The glass itself has a nice feel and the screen is quite responsive. The size is the deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: RJH

customer_reviews.title: Annoying flimsy garbage
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get 2 under the assumption that "well, if one sucks, maybe the other won't". Packaging was nice, but got a little piece of dirt on my first attempt, couldn't get it to seal quite right after cleaning that out, so attempted #2, needless to say both are going in the garbage can now and I'm just going to avoid docking my Switch since that's where all my damage will predictably come from.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Shaul

customer_reviews.title: Solid Value - Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Although a bit concerned by the price about how this would actually work for my brand new Nintendo Switch, I'm extremely pleased. It installed without a problem and no bubbles under the screen protector. Rather and try to set the protector down evenly upon the Switch screen, I set down along one edge and hinged it down gently into place. It's a solid plate of protective glass/plastic to it was easy for me to install. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ikaju

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles and poor product support
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions strictly and the top edge had some bubbling that got worse over time and now the whole top part of the screen is bubbled on the edge. I have installed hundreds of screen protectors of different brands and types when I sold cell phones for 5 years. I contacted Orzly support and they said I must have installed it incorrectly and that was all the support I was offered. The parts of the shield where there are no bubbles look nice and clear. Overall considering the bubbles and the Orzly support I received I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite screen protector
customer_reviews.text: This is my new to go to screen protector for my switch. I hate putting on screens because it messed with the picture quality and is bulky but not this one. Its thin and leaves the picture look good. I already sent messages to my switch owning friends about how good this is. Just don't use the dust remover because it's so sticky it leaves bad residual and takes a bit to scrub it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Flores

customer_reviews.title: This is how tempered glass is supposed to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many tempered glass screen protectors for my phones and I've been very happy with their performance. This screen protector lives up to the reputation of what I come to expect from a tempered glass screen protector. Application was very easy. There's no haloing after application, which is very important. Other than the shipping time to get it to me from the UK, I'm very happy with this screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Dizo

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: so i ordered the two pack of screen protectors for my switch. followed the directions exactly... had tons of bubbles for no reason at all. no dust on my screen, no fingerprints, didn’t touch the screen protected prior to application. so, i took it off and tried with the second one. even more bubbles that you cannot push out. will be returning and trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully There Were Two!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always glad when there are multiple protectors because the first one always goes awry! I would HIGHLY suggest doing it somewhere where there is absolutely NO hair, dust, lint, and it you have pets do it in a bubble! The second I peeled the first off the plastic the static drew in EVERY particle and when applied left bubbles and debris under it. The second try went MUCH better and applied well! Just a finicky product, it's very well made and packaging was great! Overall good product just hard to apply!
customer_reviews.author: "D"

customer_reviews.title: Initially I messed up the alignment so I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially I messed up the alignment so I had to remove the protector. Reapplying caused several bubbles to appear which wouldn't massage out. The bubbles didn't affect game play so I decided to deal with them, rather than wasting the protector. After leaving the Switch docked overnight all the bubbles were gone. The only downside to this protector is the obscenely long shipping time, so be aware that it will take for-ev-er to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Corner won’t stick
customer_reviews.text: These seem nice enough, but they aren’t very forgiving. I got a single piece of dust stuck at the end both times. The first time I broke it trying to lift it. The second time I could lift it and get the dust out, but now the corner doesn’t stick. This makes it look kinda funny. I might put a sticker over it to hide it. My iPhone screen protectors never had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyStuff

customer_reviews.title: Protector is great, installation accessories OK
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector itself is great. It fits the screen well, doesn't cause problems with the dock, and I had no problems applying it. The accessories were not as nice as some other brands I've used, it only comes with one alcohol wipe and the dust removal stickers were small, but they get the job done. Most people probably have things they can use if needed, so if it keeps the cost down (and these seemed to be a little less expensive than other protectors) than I think it's a good trade-off.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hyman

customer_reviews.title: Best Switch screen protector out there.
customer_reviews.text: I have had atblewst two different screen protectors for the Switch that I paid MORE money for and both of those screen protectors were trash compared to this. It goes on super easy with only one bubble. A few seconds of pushing and it was gone. I put the second screen protector on our other switch and couldn't quite get the bubble out but the protect says wairb24 hours and the bubble would be gone...and they didn't lie. That's exactly what happend. Forget other screen protectors and just get yourself one of these. You won't regret it. I won't get another from anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin L

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, goes on smoothly
customer_reviews.text: The protector went on smoothly, the instructions were clear, and having the protector on did not affect the Switch's ability to dock. Both protectors arrived intact. I used the hinge application method (before peeling off the back, place the protector exactly where you want it and tape one side in place with masking tap) and it applied completely centered, exactly where I wanted it. The kit included two glass screen protectors, two alcohol wipes, one microfiber cloth, lint-grabbing stickers, and application instructions.
customer_reviews.author: L. H.

customer_reviews.title: Protects the screen
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my kids have a tendency to drop things and it makes me especially nervous when it's something expensive. These screen protectors are great and definitely give more security to the screen - from cracks, dirt, whatever. And they are easy to clean. We have a number of kids using our Switch in the handheld way and this screen protector definitely makes me feel better about them using it and walking with it just to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Larson27

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to apply. That being said we have 5 smart phones and 3 tablets so I am use to applying screen protectors. This one was pretty much like any other one. Came with everything you needed to apply. I had no problems with dust or fogging. I like the fact that it came with two that was a nice touch. It fits the switch perfectly and my husband who is the 4d hdr tv connosier did not even notice it was on it until I said something so I am guessing clarity is A+
customer_reviews.author: Joleana Kinnett-Smith

customer_reviews.title: It does the job perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It does the job perfectly! One of the two covers actually broke in my hand just by holding it, so it's not quite as strong as I'd wish, but once it's installed it does its job perfectly. Also a WARNING: DO NOT use the dust-removing sticker that's included. It's way too sticky and will actually leave glue in the screen/cover, which you then have to work to get out. Just don't use the sticker and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mau

customer_reviews.title: so the potential downgrade in image quality was a good trade off for a protected screen
customer_reviews.text: I normally stay away from screen protectors because in my experience they result in a blurry/dim screen. I got this because I frequently take my Switch on the road and figured I’d drop it eventually, so the potential downgrade in image quality was a good trade off for a protected screen. I was pleasantly surprised to see that there was no discernible difference in image quality after I put this on my Switch. You instantly forget it’s even there. The installation was quick and easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The worst screen protector I’ve had to install. I’ve done many and none have been as temperamental as this one. First one had a lot of dust after using the dust sticker. Peeled it back and did the dust sticker again and it refused to stick anymore. Tried a second time and same thing happened. Threw them both in the trash. Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Grenfell

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Just got the screen right now and took me less than 5 minutes to install perfectly. 4 of those were just to align the screen correctly because of my OCD, but regardless and toddler can install this screen with no issues. Super clean, easy install and touch screen works perfect and I have a spare just in case this one goes bad! Win/Win here. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but the stickers were a hassle.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product before for my switch and had no issues at all and was happy with the quality and ease of use. My husband recently got a second switch so I ordered a set for him. Overall the product is great but my only gripe is that when trying to use the dust removal sticker they stuck to well and would leave a residue on the screen. This made making sure the screen was perfectly clean a pain in the ass because the residue from the stickers wasn't the easiest to wipe off. Overall I'd get the product again and just hope for less sticky stickers (the irony).
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: I've had three...
customer_reviews.text: ... which means it's saved my screen twice! I love the fact it's so easy to install and you don't have to worry TOO much about air bubbles. It also comes off just as easy which means if you make a mistake, you haven't ruined the whole thing like some of less sturdy versions of protectors out there. If you want a Switch screen protector that is worth every penny, this is the one you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Griff Greymuzzle

customer_reviews.title: Orzly delivers unparalleled protection again!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Orzly tempered glass screen protectors on my phones for two years, they've save a couple of them from broken screens. After picking up a Switch and reading the horror stories of scratched screens from the dock, it was a no brainer to pick one up for my new console. It installs easy and, over two weeks of use, has been flawless. I will always use Orzly protectors for all of my devices! It's an investment that will save you money in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: ITProGamer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, easy to apply, saves my screen.
customer_reviews.text: I've used SO many Orzly tempered glass screen protectors. Every time I get a new device, I look to see if Orzly makes one. Why? They are a great price, have great clarity, easy to apply, and have saved my devices, primarily my phone so many times. I've had a phone take a 5 ft drop flat on its face and it only cracked the tempered glass screen protector, the screen itself underneath was untouched.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my new Nintendo Switch to protect the screen from scratches. It comes with alcohol wipes and a microfiber cloth to clean your screen before placing the screen protector. The instructions included were helpful, and it was easy to install. No dust motes or air bubbles. I'd recommend this to every Switch owner.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M.Top Contributor: Manga

customer_reviews.title: Oh this feels 10,000 times better!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed when I typed in my wifi password on the Switch was that the screen feels like it doesn't have any sort of oleophobic coating, and its fingerprint magnetism confirmed it. I don't use the touch screen much, but I needed to fix this mistake. After taking 40 years to wipe off two tiny smudges on the display, I ceremoniously plopped the glass sheet over my screen, and gleefully ran my fingers over the glass. It finally feels like it should, and doesn't affect touch response in the slightest. Thanks for fixing my console!
customer_reviews.author: Birds

customer_reviews.title: Great product, looks great and fits well
customer_reviews.text: Great product, looks great and fits well. I'd give it five stars but I had ordered a few screen protectors for various products we received over the holidays and got a chance to compare this one with a competitor. The other screen protector had a nice video install and used guide stickers for alignment. After using that method and seeing the success I used their guide stickers to install this one. Wish this one had come with the same install stuff as that would have pushed it up a star. Otherwise, the product is very good, just not as easy to install as others.
customer_reviews.author: Jasen B Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and have already almost forgotten it's there.
customer_reviews.text: The application for this is easy if you follow the instructions. Clean it, wipe it, apply it. After I applied the glass screen cover, I've nearly forgotten that it's there. The only reason why I am aware that it is there is because the oleophobic coating is smoother/slipperier than the naked screen itself. I prefer the smoother touch. The protector itself also is very thin and also does not affect the functionality of the touch screen itself. As an additional bonus, this comes with two, just in case you have multiple Nintendo Switches or if you break one. I would highly recommend this screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: J. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: The price was fantastic and the application was fairly easy. I made a small mistake the first time and ended up having to remove the first screen and apply the second. The second application went really smoothly and was accomplished without getting dust or large bubbles. The few small bubbles were easily removed using the included card. Unfortunately I am noticing that there are areas where the screen appears to have something under it, but when I apply pressure the effect goes away. It looks like the adhesive isn't sticking very well in those areas. Overall I am pretty happy with the end result still.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Davis

customer_reviews.title: Two perfect installs!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I’m just experienced when it comes to installing these, but I managed to get these two screen protectors perfectly installed on two different systems. The fit is very exact so be very careful. The screen feels much more premium since it’s glass but it seems to be lacking an oleophobic coating so it is very prone to catching fingerprints and smudges
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Lomeli

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: My son dropped his Switch and the screen cracked. Luckily it had one of these on it, so when we removed the protector it was actually the protector that was cracked. Switch looks perfect. Don't use the dust remover. It is too sticky. Left a mark when reinstalling that was hard to remove. Other than that, these work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bake4fun

customer_reviews.title: I went into the bathroom to put it on and ...
customer_reviews.text: I went into the bathroom to put it on and it's flawless. The only thing I would caution about is the sticker to stick dusts off. Don't use them. They leave residues on the screen which I had to wipe vigorously to take them off. Other than that, use the alcohol wipe and microfiber cloth provided in a bathroom to put good-clear-responsive screen protector on your switch. I think the screen protector is vital for the longevity of the console.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: The glass went on very easy. I had to watch out for dust but that's always a problem putting on tempered glass. It is very clear so no drop in image quality. I did recieve mine a month late but it was cleared up that the product was being made and should be out soon through an email. The wait did not bother me and i believe it was worth the wait. I believe the wait will be much shorter now then it was so ni need to wait long times. If i need a new screen for whatever reason i will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered less than 24 hours after I ordered it. It was exactly what I expected. The screen saver itself when I’m better than anything I’ve put on any one of my smart phones or my several iPads. All I had to do is line it up and drop it. It pretty much did it all itself. I also ordered a case from the same company which was perfectly suited for the switch. Good construction great price.
customer_reviews.author: Pa2ed

customer_reviews.title: The switch screen is plastic, a protector is necessary
customer_reviews.text: I noticed right away after getting my switch that the screen on the Switch is plastic and prone to scratches unlike a smartphone, so I decided to try a screen protector for it. This product was easy to apply. Looks and feels great! I had zero issue with this product and would recommend it to anybody who wants an inexpensive, but quality screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Absolute trash!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Giant bubble didn't go away. Worked feverishly to clean my screen of dust - their microfiber cloth only adds more dust - and then dust immediately clings to the sticky screen side when you go to apply. Returning immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Orzly Tempered Screen Protectors are just... PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector was so easy to install, took less than 3 minutes from alcohol wipes to plopping the screen down. This protector covers the whole screen just align one side make sure its straight with the edge and drop and the adhesive took care of the rest. Love that the edges are rounded and cutouts were perfect!! I love Orzly products ever since I had their screen protector on my OnePlus One... I think Orzly is my go to tempered glass screen protector from now on. Orzly did not pay me to say any of this just a big fan of their products
customer_reviews.author: ASU_Go_Devils

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: These screen protectors were awesome. My husband put it on my son's switch & it really looked great. We had initially purchased a set that had a plastic screen protector & it was totally useless & impossible to get all the air bubbles out. The glass ones are definitely the way to go. I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Giving this 5 stars. Easy to install, was able to put it on first time no adjustments needed. I did heed the warnings of others before me and did NOT use any of provided products to help with install. With that being said I am only reviewing the actual screen protector. I did make sure to clean my screen before hand and used a can of forced air to help make sure all the dust particles were off the screen.
customer_reviews.author: BraderSk8r

customer_reviews.title: and endlessly searched and searched for the best screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I recently got my Nintendo Switch , and endlessly searched and searched for the best screen protector. Never used a tempered glass screen protector, and let me tell you. This one is AMAZING!! It fits great! Luckily I didn’t have any of the issues with shipping, but now I see it's on amazon prime so no more worries there! Anyways fits great for me and fits in the dock with the protector on, which is something I was worried about!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Baylor

customer_reviews.title: Protects the screen as it should
customer_reviews.text: The product does exactly what it’s suppose to. All the negative reviews about the dust stickers getting stuck, have to be user error. I had no problem with it getting stuck. The screen goes on nice and easy. And you get two screens. If you need a screen protector, get this one. Cheap easy to use and protects like it should. If it can holds up to a 2yo and 6 yo of can hold up to whatever you’re going to throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Previously purchased the tempered glass protector from techmatte and it didn't work well. The sides chipped easily and I got constant air bubbles during application. This is what led me to purchase this one from Orzly. The day my screen protector arrived, Orzly sent an email listing tips from previous customers and a youtube instructional video from Orzly. A+ for customer service Pros: Packaging was great Application is easy Air bubbles push out automatically Smaller air bubbles pushed out without using the card they provided Sides did not chip easily when lifting Cons: Only one alcohol wipe Dust sticker left a minor hairline scratch on my switch (not visible with protector)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: High quality. But DONT use the dust sticker.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality screen protector. A MUST HAVE for the Switch. Why the Switch screen is plastic, I don't know. Here are some things you need to know- Do NOT use the dust removal sticker. Due to the Switch screen being plastic, sticker residue stays on the screen and it is impossible to remove when you're in the middle of installing the protector. Thus, I had to waste one of my screen protectors. Sit down while installing any screen protector, hold it with a finger on each corner and slowly lay it straight down on the device. Any screen protector takes extreme care and patience.
customer_reviews.author: Lance S.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!
customer_reviews.text: Back in January of 2018, I purchased a two-pack of these screen protectors & applied one to my Switch & the other to my nephew's. Both were very easy to apply & have remained intact this entire time. View-abilty (not sure if this is a word) seems as good as looking directly at the actual screen & we sometimes forget that we even have screen protectors. Highly recommended for anyone paranoid about scratching, or worse, breaking their Switch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Moniker Shmoniker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Slightly rounded edges
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought a different screen protector for my Switch. Due to user error, I had trapped dust in between my screen and screen protector. Saw this 2pk on Amazon for half the price I paid for my previous one. The difference in quality is night and day. You don't know how good rounded edges are until you have them. Anyway, I purchased this 2pk thinking I was going to need up. I didn't. It was too easy to install given that you take your time.
customer_reviews.author: Daigi

customer_reviews.title: Fool Proof
customer_reviews.text: One night the Switch accidentally slipped out of my hands and fell, to my surprise the screen was terribly cracked. I was so scared I hid the thing for nearly a week. Yes, I the parent was afraid of a 7 year old kid. To later find the second screen protector and realize that what I cracked was the first one I had place when I first got it. Needless to say I bought another set of these because clearly I'm a bigger threat than my child.
customer_reviews.author: Nmldo

customer_reviews.title: Completely trash
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this screen protector becuase of its thin size but oh boy it impossible to install!!! I ordered this item two times which in total give me 4 screen protector to play with. And I messed up all four becuase when i installed it, it either had bubbles that wouldn't go away or there were no bubbles but dust underneath which really bothered me ... Ugh.. I would just stick with the am screen protector, sure the am is thicker but the installation is 100 times easier!! And it only took 1 am screen protector to get it right!
customer_reviews.author: abel

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles, bubbles everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I've done my fair share of screen protector applications and gotten pretty good at it over the years - for some reason though, these things just won't stick to the screen without having huge bubbles in the center. They don't show them until a couple hours after application, at which point it's too late to try to adjust them. Maybe I just got a bad batch, or something happened to them in transit? Ah well, I'll try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: JMKTech

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen protectors, one of mine had a defect in it though
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality and thinner than other glass protectors I've tried. Only problem I had was when I put the first one on, there was a defect in the center of the screen that did not look like an air bubble, but it would not lay flat. It wasn't dust either. The second protector went on better though, just a shame I didn't have the opportunity to make the most of both.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: The best screen protector I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: This was probably the easiest screen protector I've installed on any device! They give you everything you need to clear dust and fingerprints from the Switch and provide easy to read instructions. It lined up perfectly with the speaker notches on the Switch and I was able to get it on with one try. There were a couple of air bubbles, but I was able to squeeze those out with no issue. Product was well packaged so I wouldn't worry about the glass cracking during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: James G

customer_reviews.title: Good but watch out for ink on removal tool.
customer_reviews.text: Beware of the plastic removal tool. The ink that is used to print the logo on the plastic card chips off super easy and gets dry ink particles on your screen or stuck to the underside of the screen protector. If you need to lift your screen protector back up for some reason, either scratch the ink off the card or use some other plastic card like a credit card instead. Otherwise screen protector is of good quality and proper fit. It is best to place the screen protector on the screen and use some tape on one end to use as a hinge for alignment.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing screen protector/tempered glass
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on. I did on two switches and not once did I get any Air bubbles. They also have a helpful video online just in case you want to see how to properly put it on. Does not Darken the screen or intrude with touchscreen functionality. Best of all it comes with everything that you will need to have your screen clean before applying the protector I highly recommend this product to every switch owner out there. have a great day
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: S A T I S F Y I N G
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, putting these tempered glass screen protectors on needs to be in one of those "Mosts Satisfying" videos online! Install this while playing some V A P O R W A V E in the background! LOL So as far as quality... Perfection! I no longer fear scratching my Switch, at all! I feel confident in even pocketing the system in my cargo pants with this screen protector installed. The unit still fits fine in the dock. I gave the spare to a friend who also got a Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Richfiles

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the AmFilm one!
customer_reviews.text: I went through about six of the AmFilm screen protectors and had problems with each of them. Mainly them showing the adhesive on some of the sides that kept coming back. I decided to try Orzly and first try it was perfect. I was so happy because I have terrible OCD about screen protectors and was worried there would never be one that I got on perfectly that had no issues. None of the adhesive is showing after multiple hours playing dock. I did let it rest for 48 hours before I played however. Quality is great and screen is crystal clear. This is better than the AmFilm one and deserves to be the top Nintendo Switch Protector!
customer_reviews.author: Indominus

customer_reviews.title: Really great glass screen protector
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to apply, just watch the video and it'll show you, but kind of stressful because you don't wanna mess it up. Even if you mess it up though the pack comes with 2 so it would be easy to take off, clean and try again. Overall I love the screen protector itself, I got it because I was scared of the "dock scratches" everyone has been talking about, but now that I have one I love it for more than just that. I'd go so far as to say it feels and looks even better than the plastic screen the switch comes with, it's so sleek and feels more sturdy than the plastic, highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Bri🌙

customer_reviews.title: good tempered glass
customer_reviews.text: the first orzly glass I received were not great. first had to contact orzly to learn it's fulfilled by amazon. then had to contact amazon to get replacement after I received the replacement, put it on, and it's great works much better than the amfilm one that has adhesive melted while playing docked mode. Amazon is as usual great at handling the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Liu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have guide stickers, but managed with some tape
customer_reviews.text: Some of these glass protectors come with guide stickers; this one does not. You place the protector with the plastic still on and put the stickers on the edge of the protector to keep it's place then take the plastic off to put it in the perfect spot. I had to try twice as some dust snuck in the first time. Glad i got the 2 pack
customer_reviews.author: RavenMac

customer_reviews.title: Though it goes on easily, making air bubbles easy to avoid
customer_reviews.text: Though it goes on easily, making air bubbles easy to avoid, it doesn't have the matte feature that seems necessary for the switch. The lack of a matte finish makes screen glare and reflection a HUGE problem. I blame myself for not noticing that this one didn't have a matte finish. But it's going right in the trash and I'm ordering a better one elsewhere. I don't want to see my face when I'm playing, and it makes it impossible to play outside.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Domantovsky

customer_reviews.title: Passed the test with flying colors!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Glad it comes with two screen covers— I used the first one for about 3 years then dropped my switch and the glass screen cracked badly while totally protecting the screen beneath. Easy to remove and replace with a fresh one. Great quality and protection!
customer_reviews.author: Grace E.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to position
customer_reviews.text: Works with the dock able cases, somewhat hard to apply, I had to take them on and off several times, which I've never had to do with other brand screen protectors. I ruined one protector but this comes with two, so I was able to get the second one to a acceptable position. One of the corners is not sticking due to having to putt it off once for the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Neal

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard to put on.
customer_reviews.text: Luckily it has multiple glasses. I messed the first one up as I was having issues with air bubbles. The second one ended up with one bubble on the edge that refused to go away but it wasn't noticeable when the unit was one. I hope to never test out how good it protects it but I do feel better that I have something on it.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: 0 for 2
customer_reviews.text: On the first attempt, the corner of the screen protector cracked when attempting to adjust a slight mis-alignment. So, I was forced to try again using the second one. Unfortunately, despite following the instructions to a T, I was left with a significant air bubble in the center of the screen which simply would not go away despite all my efforts. In the end, I was forced to lift up one of the corners to relieve the air which resulted in that same corner not adhering properly after the fact. Maybe others will have better success but these simply did not live up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Just another useless piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Same as every other cheap screen protector I've bought for the switch. It cracked within the first week despite me being even more gentle with it than normal. I really wish there was a company that made a worthwhile product these days...
customer_reviews.author: Kyle L.

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Install Ever
customer_reviews.text: I was feeling all kinds of intimidated because I have never actually installed a screen protector on my own before. This was so easy. They have a video with instructions to make it even more fool-proof and it fit my Switch to perfection. I even lifted it up a few times (I am neurotic about my tech) still stuck perfect with absolutely no bubbles to be found.
customer_reviews.author: Meli Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to use; no bubbles and no weird trapped dust. I put the screen protectors on two switches in December and 5 months later they still look like they were freshly applied. I’m not good at this type of thing and even I succeeded. I just followed all the instructions and recommendations that came with it. I will definitely buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Crapshoot.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe you'll get a good alignment without any smudges or lint, or maybe you'll get scratched cases. Feeling like a bit of a waste of money to me at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great screen protector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great screen protector. It's the type where you place it on the NS, and some sort of liquid seals the screen to the tablet (eliminating bubbles). Also, I tried smearing the screen with my fingers, and it does a great job keeping fingerprints off. Of course, if it's just a coating, maybe that will wear out over time. After the pain of getting a decent protector for my phone, I'm glad I got this one right for the Nintendo Switch on my first try.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best Switch screen protectors.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a screen protector at Best Buy when I bought my son his switch. I didn't want him to go without one at all. It was a plastic version but overtime it became destroyed. He's had the Orzly Glass version on and it is so much better. The clarity is 10x better and cleaner it is easier.
customer_reviews.author: Micky Pineda

customer_reviews.title: ... not planning to buy a screen protector as I like the feel of the naked glass
customer_reviews.text: I originally was not planning to buy a screen protector as I like the feel of the naked glass, but the fear of scratching on docking caused me to look around for one anyway. I opted for these based on reviews and I can say that I actually prefer the feel of the device with the Orzly protector on it. I wasn't terribly worried about scratches in the first place, but now I can completely forget about them.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Beckstrand

customer_reviews.title: Finally a screen protector worth getting.
customer_reviews.text: I only wish phone screen protectors were this nice and simple to install. Went on first try, very clear, didn't flush out any colors or give a weird tactile feel when using the touch screen mode. No bubbling on first attempt, easy to clean and is actually resistant to finger printing. I waited about a month before posting a review and it is perfect, didn't peel/fade or grow a yellow tint.
customer_reviews.author: O. Karayoff

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a defective set, do not use the lint stickers.
customer_reviews.text: I had to go through both screen protectors the package came with over the course of a month. The first one had lifting issues on all corners no matter how hard i pressed. The 2nd one I used had really bad bubbling issues. Not to mention the terrible lint stickers, do not use....they leave a terrible residue on the screen. Going to try the amfilm one.
customer_reviews.author: mike.

customer_reviews.title: fantastic, have to thank youtube Blunty for his video.
customer_reviews.text: Blunty was right, these are fantastic. I did have a human error, I live in Texas and messed up my first one, but then I stopped being stubborn and watched how to put on and the second looks great, no bubbles. Thank you blunty for that youtube video. Also, the first one became my test. As I am a painter, I have box cutter and knives. I went to town on that first one I messed up and you couldn't scratch it. Also, if you play zelda, and you play at night and start turning your switch due to a puzzle, when you turn it completely to the side, you get a neat lighting effect.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Follow tips and Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The products is great and when I was done, I was glad that it came with two screen protectors. It is easy to install but takes patience and a very steady hand so you don't have to use them both like I did. My recommendation is to follow the tips the company sent you via email as well as application instructions on the packaging. I got the first one installed but I had installed it crooked, so I had to reposition it without touching the adhesive side. I finally got the second one installed properly after the first one losing its stickiness. Looks great on the product and you wouldn't know it was on there looking at the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Wernecke

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Both of my screen protectors broke while adjusting them during application to my switch. I cleaned the screen, then used the microfiber to dry and touch up, but it actually added dust or the material itself was shedding off little particles onto the screen. This was a waste of money cause I am still without a screen protector. PS I used the shower\steam method to avoid dust in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Blessington

customer_reviews.title: Clear, easy to apply, and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Very good, especially for the price. It is very clear and I can barely even tell it is on my Switch. The feeling of the screen protector actually feels better to touch than the actual screen of the device, and it is pretty easy to apply with no bubbles whatsoever. One nice thing is that the added thickness makes putting the system in the dock feel nicer and less clunky. Plus this comes with two protectors so if you mess up the first time, you can still get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Simple and it works.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy this, but I couldn't find a glass protector that had any better reviews than any other. You have to try to remove as much dust and oil/fingerprints you can. If your ceiling fan is on, turn it off. This comes from putting quite a few of these on phones, tablets, etc., and getting bubbles with more than a few. Followed instructions and it adhered right away.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Purchase hates Toast

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It fit pretty easily to the Switch’s screen. It’s kept it protected for several weeks now. The middle shows no wear, but the sides of the plastic, closer to the buttons, has lots of visual scratches. Overall, good product. I like that it comes with 2 screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: KrystalP

customer_reviews.title: Not very forgiving
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to apply but if you don’t have it lined up perfect it’s almost impossible to reposition. I had to use both right away because the first wasn’t lined up right and somehow even though we cleaned the screen thoroughly there were a couple of pieces of glitter that got stuck to the cover. Guess that’s just part of life with girls.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen protector, but difficult application cuz you have to do it by hand and make sure it's centered.. big air bubbles underneath it won't come out. But most naturally comes out after a week or two. I guess you just have to put it on more carefully.. Otherwise, it comes with two screen protectors if you need to try again. Nice protector hasn't scratched or anything, good quality glass. Honestly can't complain it's a great quality screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: I just recently got my new Nintendo Switch, and I ordered the Orzly screen protector based on positive reviews. The screen protector was packaged nicely and had easy to follow instructions for applying. It was pretty easy to apply to the console screen and there were no bubbles. The console slides easily into the docking station and seems to do a good job of protecting the screen. I'll have a more complete idea of how the screen protector does with a bit more time, but so far I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Lujan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect except for one corner! It seems as if it didn't have adhesive to stick onto the screen. I'm left with the top corner not even sticking onto the switch EDIT: After contacting the customer service about a defect in the screen protector I ordered, I immediately received a replacement that worked great
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo A.M

product_meta.title: Orzly Glass Screen Protectors compatible with Nintendo Switch - Premium Tempered Glass Screen Protector TWIN PACK [2x Screen Guards - 0.24mm] for 6.2 Inch Tablet Screen on Nintendo Switch Console
product_meta.description:
ULTIMATE PROTECTION AND USABILITY:

Our Premium Tempered Glass Screen Protectors are designed to protect the screen of your Nintendo Switch tablet against every day use, scratches, dust and fingerprint smudges. Manufactured from a high quality chemically treated glass, the screen protectors are lightweight, thin but most importantly, extremely protective. A specially coated adhesive means the screen protector is perfectly fitted to your tablet screen's display, ensuring that the clarity and sensitivity of your screen are not reduced.

HARDNESS:

Industry-high hardness: Effectively resists scratches up to 9H (harder than a knife).

OLEOPHOBIC COATING: 

The Oleophobic coating built in to these screen protectors is a special oil-repellent coating which ensures any finger print smudges or marks can be easily wiped off.

EASY INSTALLATION:

Due to their solid nature, tempered glass screen protectors are much easier to fit and less error prone than standard screen protectors. For the most hassle free, bubble free installation, please see and follow carefully the detailed and easy step-by-step instructions included within the pack.

WARRANTY INCLUDED:

Any manufacturing defects are covered by a 2 year limited manufacturer warranty. For any damaged in transit products, please contact the seller directly for assistance.
feature_bullets: Tempered Glass construction for enhanced impact resistance, plus effectively resists scratches up to 9H (harder than a knife)

High-response: Only 0.24mm thick; maintains the original touch experience, and won't interfere with slotting the tablet into the home console hub. High transparency: 94% light penetration ratio preserves the original viewing quality
Rounded edges provides safe and improved grip, along with tempering process of glass for shatter-proof film
Nintendo Switch Screen Protector with cut-outs for all sensors; Includes 2 Year Limited Manufacturer Warranty
For our full range of Nintendo Switch accessories, search 'ORZLY SWITCH' in the Amazon search bar (above)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars14,540 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
